page.title: 02Education _ Schools
page.content: Our school is called{Hinchliffe Mill {Primary School}or Dobb Top School. There was a school called{Holmbridge {C of E School.}There were only 19 pupils in the school when it closed down because the roof wasn't safe.When the school closed down in 1984 the children came to Hinchliffe Mill School.James Keddy used to go to Holmbridge C of E school and he said "Sometimes I prefer my old school but sometimes I prefer my new school" We have 70 children in our school and we are split into 4 classes. Holmbridge School building is for sale. The church want Â£25,000 for it.
